member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobs.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: If disposing equals true, the method has been called directly or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resources can be disposed. If false, the method has been called by the runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not reference other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobs.Label(OpenCvSharp.IplImage,OpenCvSharp.IplImage)
member.summary: Label the connected parts of a binary image. (cvLabel)
member.param: Input binary image (depth=IPL_DEPTH_8U and num. channels=1).
member.returns: Number of pixels that has been labeled.

member.summary: Draw a binary image with the blobs that have been given. (cvFilterLabels)

member.summary: Filter blobs by area. Those blobs whose areas are not in range will be erased from the input list of blobs. (cvFilterByArea)

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobs.Add(System.UInt32,OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlob)
member.summary: Adds the specified key and value to the dictionary.
member.param: The object to use as the key.
The object to use as the value.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobs.ContainsKey(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Determines whether the IDictionary contains an element with the specified key.
member.param: The key to locate in the IDictionary<TKey,TValue>.
member.returns: true if the IDictionary<TKey,TValue> contains an element with the key; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobs.Remove(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Removes the element with the specified key from the IDictionary<TKey,TValue>.
member.param: The key of the element to remove.
member.returns: true if the element is successfully found and removed; otherwise, false. This method returns false if key is not found in the IDictionary<TKey, TValue>.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobs.TryGetValue(System.UInt32,OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlob@)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with the specified key.
member.param: The key whose value to get.
When this method returns, the value associated with the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, the default value for the type of the value parameter. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: true if the object that implements IDictionary contains an element with the specified key; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Calculates perimeter of a polygonal contour.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon.PolygonContourConvexHull
member.summary: Calculates convex hull of a contour. Uses the Melkman Algorithm. Code based on the version in http://w3.impa.br/~rdcastan/Cgeometry/.
member.returns: Convex hull.

member.summary: Draw a polygon.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon.SimplifyPolygon
member.summary: Simplify a polygon reducing the number of vertex according the distance "delta". Uses a version of the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer-Douglas-Peucker_algorithm).
member.returns: A simplify version of the original polygon.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon.SimplifyPolygon(System.Double)
member.summary: Simplify a polygon reducing the number of vertex according the distance "delta". Uses a version of the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer-Douglas-Peucker_algorithm).
member.returns: A simplify version of the original polygon.

member.returns: Angle orientation in radians.

member.summary: Calculates angle orientation of a blob. This function uses central moments so cvCentralMoments should have been called before for this blob. (cvAngle)
member.returns: Angle orientation in radians.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobLib.CentralMoments(OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlob,OpenCvSharp.IplImage)
member.summary: Calculates central moment for a blob. Central moments will be stored in blob structure. (cvCentralMoments)

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobLib.Centroid(OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlob)
member.summary: Calculates centroid. Centroid will be returned and stored in the blob structure. (cvCentroid)
member.param: Blob whose centroid will be calculated.
member.returns: Centroid.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobLib.ContourPolygonArea(OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon)
member.summary: Calculates area of a polygonal contour.
member.returns: Area of the contour.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobLib.ContourPolygonPerimeter(OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon)
member.summary: Calculates perimeter of a polygonal contour.
member.returns: Perimeter of the contour.

member.summary: Convert a chain code contour to a polygon.
member.returns: A polygon.

member.summary: Filter blobs by area. Those blobs whose areas are not in range will be erased from the input list of blobs. (cvFilterByArea)

member.summary: Label the connected parts of a binary image. (cvLabel)

member.returns: Convex hull.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobLib.SimplifyPolygon(OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon)
member.summary: Simplify a polygon reducing the number of vertex according the distance "delta". Uses a version of the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer-Douglas-Peucker_algorithm).
member.returns: A simplify version of the original polygon.

member.name: M:OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvBlobLib.SimplifyPolygon(OpenCvSharp.Blob.CvContourPolygon,System.Double)
member.summary: Simplify a polygon reducing the number of vertex according the distance "delta". Uses a version of the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer-Douglas-Peucker_algorithm).
member.returns: A simplify version of the original polygon.
